title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Unify Data for a Strong AI Foundation with AWS & Salesforce (DAT206)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 通过 AWS 与 Salesforce 统一数据以构建强大的 AI 基础 (DAT206)
abstract: Unify data across AWS and within Salesforce without complex, costly replication, using Zero Copy data integration between Salesforce Data 360 and AWS. This presentation is brought to you by Salesforce, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 使用 Salesforce Data 360 与 AWS 之间的零拷贝数据集成,无需复杂、昂贵的数据复制即可统一 AWS 和 Salesforce 内的数据。本演示由 AWS 合作伙伴 Salesforce 为您呈现。
